result.execSummary:
The defendant Aaron Stroot was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Polk County Clerk of Court Office

supervisions.notes:
Must report to Probation today (5/20/2016).
Probation may discharge early if recommended.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/cost to be paid to Probation while on Probation.  If amount is not paid, may be reduced to civil judgment.

$145.63 Restitution, plus 10% surcharge of $14.56, for a total of $160.19, to be paid to Probation while on Probation.  If amount is not paid, may be reduced to civil judgment.  Joint & Several with Adam Evans (14CF191).

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes: Subject to good time and work release. TIME SERVED. May serve any remaining days in Burnett County as long as no cost to Polk County.
Court costs to be reduced to a civil judgment.

May not possess or use firearms or body armor.   If not a U.S. Citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights. Cannot vote until civil rights restored. Cannot hold elective office. Other civil rights may be lost until restored.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
